content:
Whova is the Virtual Meeting Application we use to house all our schedules and links to virtual meeting rooms for the Connectathon. To learn more about how Whova is used for the Connectathon and better prepare yourself to participate in the event, please register here for the “Whova for Connectathon Participants” session on January 12, 2021 at 1:00 PM PT here: https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/7488503627789547533
We will Record the session and make the recording available immediately following.
